reviewText:
It's hard to say if I like this game a lot.  I designed an actual turn based soccer game so when  I saw this I was interested.  I have played a few matches on various accounts and machines.  Here is what I do like:

turn based.  ive always liked turn based.
graphics arent too bad
its pretty simple to play

heres what i dont like:

- in spite of having options like headers, etc.  I still havent found a use for them.  this is basically a run dribble run shoot kinda game - and shooting is if you get lucky.
-takes a long time to play.  If i was playing a season, id be dead before i ever finished.
- player models are wonky and out dated
- after a bit, the game play is kind of limited...you find yourself doing the same thing over and over again...

what i might change (and perhaps this exists and i just havent found em yet):

- maybe allow for two passes in some instances
- designate movement zones for run and jog (which affects fatigue)
- update the graphics some
- update the mechanics a bit.  i just feel like they represent a game from 1991.

anyway - i applaud the idea and the effort of the dev or devs.  i think its a brilliant idea and would love to see an updated version of something like this.

thanks.  if this game continues to get updates, then i can recommend it.
voteText: 14 of 15 people (93%) found this review helpful
